statements: SELECT * FROM customer_ltv;
SELECT customer_id, total_orders, total_returns FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, last_purchase_date FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_orders >= 10 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT total_purchase_amount, total_orders, total_returns FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_returns < 5 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount, total_orders, last_purchase_date FROM customer_ltv WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_orders FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_orders >= 5 AND total_returns = 0 ORDER BY total_orders ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_orders, total_returns FROM customer_ltv WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_orders DESC, total_returns ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount, total_orders, total_returns, last_purchase_date FROM customer_ltv ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, first_purchase_date FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE first_purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(order_total) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, lifetime_value FROM customer_lifetime_value WHERE lifetime_value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM customers_products;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, products.product_name, products.unit_price FROM customers_products JOIN customers ON customers_products.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON customers_products.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(payments.payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT products.product_name, AVG(customers_products.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM customers_products JOIN products ON customers_products.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
